name: Void Hero
description:
A grid-based dungeon crawler where you gather weapons to defeat the monsters of the void  ⚔️

Traverse each level and reach the boss at level 20. Clear out each level without trapping yourself and get that HIGHSCORE!

  • Navigate 20 Levels
  • Collect weapons, armor and items
  • Purchase upgrades and items at the shop
  • Persistent highscores
  • 8 Different monster types

Controls

  • move - arrow keys
  • interact- x
  • return - z

Inspired by Crypt Creeper, the Sludge Life mini-game
